description.description: Be named the Member of the Month and receive a shout-out on our social media!
This LED light strip is colour changing, and can be synced with sound and music!
This convenient lamp comes with a flexible arm, five colour modes and a USB charging port.
This clip-on light is a convenient way to give extra light for Zoom calls and video meetings.
Wear these comfortable and stylish Blankets for T.O. masks the next time you go out!
Take astonishing aerial shots with this mini drone!
This Fujifilm Instax Mini 11 Polaroid Camera is wonderful for taking pictures to capture life's moments.
Your choice of University of Toronto merchandise up to a $30 CAD.
